text: If i'm doing a mutating function, should I put return nothing at the end of it or will julia know not to return anything?

elements.text: If i'm doing a mutating function, should I put return nothing at the end of it or will julia know not to return anything?

text: You can return anything you want. Often mutating functions will return the object they've mutated.

elements.text: You can return anything you want. Often mutating functions will return the object they've mutated.

text: Does that mean a copy of the object is created?

elements.text: Does that mean a copy of the object is created?

text: I'm not sure what you mean. A copy isn't created unless you copy it. :thinking_face:

elements.text: I'm not sure what you mean. A copy isn't created unless you copy it.
